document_data.mainbody:
Daardendrien Nijana was a dragonborn warrior member of Clan Daardendrien, and a member of the Lance Defenders of Djerad Kethendi in 1487 DR.
She was capable of breathing acid.
Nijana was the daughter of Daardendrien Turan and the sister of Medrash.See Notes.
Nijana was one of the survivors of the Kethendan forward regiment of the Lance Defenders, 
On Hammer 8 of 1487 DR, Nijana led a group of survivors of that battle to safety, after they freed themselves from chains, taking advantage of a storm that interrupted Gilgeams speech on the eve of the battle of Djerad Thymar.
